name: Infitity Strike - Online FPS
description:
Infinity Strike is a new multiplayer and single-player FPS shooter.

New tactical gameplay, high-quality graphics and fast-paced action.
You can play with other players online or make your own room and invite your friends to join this separate room.

Multiplayer is an open team, and you don't have to wait for the game rooms to fill up to start a match. At any time, a player can enter and exit the game room, and other players are automatically synchronized.
If you want to prepare for multiplayer or are not connected to the Internet, you can play in single player mode with bots.
The enemy in single player mode is tactical bot soldiers. Collect cash coins to increase and upgrade your weapon inventory.
Once you upgrade your weapon, you can use it fully charged in both single and multiplayer modes.
Weapons inventory consists of various types of weapons. Weapons can be upgraded with various sights, optics, and silencers.
4 online game modes!

We are waiting for you in our new online game-Infinity Strike-Online FPS
